posts.message:
[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NVSJRhW.png[/img]

Thank you for reading HF News. View past HF News editions by clicking [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=162]here[/url].[/align]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v1/Headlines.png[/img]
[img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v1/Odus.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Nothing to Report[/color][/b]
A quiet week? This is a first. No site changes, notable members leaving, account reminders, new awards/features, PSAs, nothing. We shall try again for edition #262.

[b][color=white]Seem Short?[/color][/b]
If you’re wondering why some of your favorite sections may be missing from this edition, the HF News is going through a major overhaul so we included only core articles for now. The new system is planned for edition 262 or 263. Stay tuned.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v1/UserNews.png[/img]
[img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v1/630.png[/img][/align]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v1/NotableThreads.png[/img]
[img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v1/Wires.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

No announcement threads were made this week.

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5013359][b]The Swat Team is knocking on your door, what will you do?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1754121][b][color=#FFFFFF]๖ۣۜSyriamanal[/color][/b][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]๖ۣۜSyriamanal tells us what he would do if the government was knocking on his door all of a sudden. What would you do - open the door or flee?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5015208][b]Is love real?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=863752][b]Hexicidal[/b][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The long controversial debate still exists. Join the discussion and share your experience, and/or give your opinion on "is love real" or not.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5013951][b]Illegal or Legal money?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1624177][b]BОEF[/b][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Join the discussion on whether you would prefer to have legal or illegal money.

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

No informational threads were made this week.

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[list]
[*] [b][color=#EFEFEF]No member feedback threads this week! If you want your feedback thread mentioned here, then head on over to the [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=2&page=2][color=white]Rules, Announcements, News, and Feedback[/color][/url] section and create one! Post a link to it on [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=4992602][color=white][u]this[/u][/color][/url] thread and you may see your thread here in the next edition of the Hack Forums News![/color][/b]
[/list]

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5016586][b]1 Year Celebration | Immortal Crypter over 1k+ Customers| 1 License per page.[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=642769][b][color=#00AAFF]Infinity.[/color][/b][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Infinity. is offering everyone the opportunity to receive a free copy of Immortal Crypter. A winner will be chosen per page, all you have to do is post! 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5016586][b]Axiom | L33T/UB3R/Gift Award | 3 winners![/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1795776][b]Actress[/b][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The member Actress is giving away an award and has given users a chance to be upgraded. If you want to be upgraded or get an award for free you should enter this contest.

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5012367][b]What kinda body type are you?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2414384][b][color=#00AAFF]ωolf
[/color][/b][/url][color=#333333]---[/color]The member ωolf has asked users to share their body type. Feel free to join the discussion and share what kind of body type you have.

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/j3ZTNCt.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Almost Ready[/color][/b]
Hold on just a bit longer, our new system is almost done. Expect it to go live either 262 or 263. The new system mainly affects how we create and process the news but also how the end product will look.

[color=transparent]   [/color]
